issues.details: Xi stated that Taiwan's Chinese sovereignty is crucial to the international order, implying that Taiwan remains part of China.

confirmed_facts: Xi Jinping called U.S. President Donald Trump on 2025â€‘11â€‘25.
During the call, Xi said Taiwanâ€™s Chinese sovereignty is important to the international order.
Xi noted that U.S.â€“China relations improved after the 2025â€‘10 Busan summit.
Xi emphasized the need to expand cooperation and narrow differences between the two countries.

timeline.event: Xi Jinping and Donald Trump held a summit in Busan, South Korea.
